amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning the provision of health care for children before providing tax cuts for the wealthy.

action.text: Amendment SA 2596 proposed by Senator Durbin.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2596.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2596 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 337.
Amendment SA 2596 ruled out of order by the chair.
